Description: Gathers and performs analyses on data within the data warehouse and suggesting new reports for the Reporting Section.This job will provide consistent meaningful data to decision-makers and improve decision making.1.Performs data analysis and interpretation of data provided within the data warehouse and related data marts.2.Supports responses to queries for analysis.3.Supports making recommendations based on the analysis performed including presenting their findings.4.Understands data availability & access across most data systems and works to improve accuracy and availability.5.Creates manual data extractions where necessary.6.Supports in the build and maintenance of custom dashboards.7.Assists in defining analytics strategy and templates.8.Follows prescribed system safety and security procedures of computing environment.9.Participates in self & others' education, training and development, as applicable.10.Follows all hospital related policies and procedures.11.Performs other related duties as assigned.Master’s or Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or related discipline is required.Three (3) years of related experience with Master’s Degree, or five (5) years of related experience with Bachelor’s Degree is required.N/AJob Details
